msContents.summary: Image 5r:-32r: Image of Michael, Mälk‘a Mika’el, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡. Répertoire 119. Images 33l-52l: Image of Gabriel, Mälk‘a Gäbra’el, መልክአ፡ ገብርኤል፡. Images 52r-61r: Image of Saint George, Mälk‘a Giyorgis, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡. Répertoire 208. Images 62l-66l: Asmat Prayer Against Jauntice, ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ዓይነ፡ ወርቅ፡, written in a different hand and laid out in two columns and 23 lines. Images 66l, col. 2-80r, col. 1: Prayer of Our Lady Mary at Golgotha, Säne Golǝgota, ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡. Copied and printed several times in its Gə‘əz and Amharic versions, e.g., ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ በመቃብረ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1949 E.C.); ጸሎተ፡ እግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዘሰኔ፡ ጎልጎታ፡ (Addis Ababa: Täsfa, 1963 E.C.); see also Grébaut, “La prière de Marie au Golgotha,” and Basset, Apocryphes 5 30 –47; StrLin 47, ; EMML 1213, . Images 80l, col. 2-80r: Image of Mary of Edom. መልክአ፡ ኤዶም. Répertoire 221. Image 32r (and passim) mentions the owner, ወልደ ሚካኤል, and a later owner, ገብረ መርያም. The harags are indicative of the Menilek or Haile Selassie scriptoria.
